title: LafargeHolcim sinks to loss, plans revamp
text:
LafargeHolcim sinks to loss, plans revamp 8:59am EST - 01:53 
The world's biggest cement maker, LafargeHolcim, reports a 3.1 billion Swiss franc ($3.3 billion) net loss during its fourth quarter but sets out a five-year turnaround plan under which, it says, it aims to grow faster than the overall market. Silvia Antonioli reports.
